snippet: Landon Donovan announced that he would retire at the end of the M.L.S. season, but it will be a while before the United States sees another player like him.
abstract: Sam Borden On Soccer column highlights American soccer star Landon Donovan, who has announced that he will retire at the end of 2014 Major League Soccer season; holds that Donovan has long been the face of American soccer, and will remain one of its icons even in retirement.
lead_paragraph: Landon Donovan announced that he would retire at the end of the M.L.S. season, but it will be a while before the United States sees another player like him.

headline.seo: Landon Donovan to Retire at End of Season
headline.main: Unorthodox Star Took U.S. Soccer on New Path
headline.print_headline: Donovan Took U.S. Soccer on New Path

keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
keywords.name: organizations
